评论概述: Looks fine, but low quality fabric
评论详情: Overall I think it’s cute and functional, but there are some issues. The construction is fine. The fit of the dress is flattering. The bust is a bit tight; it’s made in a way that pushes the girls up and together so keep that in mind. If you’re particularly busty you might want to size up. The dress itself is a bit stretchy so there’s some give. I will say however that the material feels very cheap and stiff. When it arrived, it was horribly wrinkled. It’s definitely not something you can wear right out of the package. Even after steaming it, when I wore it it wrinkled badly every time I sat down.  I think it would be great for a costume, but not so much for every day use. In my opinion it’s overpriced.

I bought this dress to wear for Halloween. For the price of it I expected more! The photos that are on Amazon make it look like a high quality dress. When in fact I was incredibly disappointed, it came in the night I need it! Tried it on did not fit 3x fits more like a medium couldn’t even zip the dress up. The material felt like paper it was very thin. I ended up throwing it into the trash. HIGHLY RECOMMEND NOBODY BUY THIS DRESS!!

Cute dress but not worth what was paid. Fabric is super cheap feeling, think cheap drugstore costume material. Thought something with the original price of 99 dollars would be better quality. Paid over 40.

Overall, I love this dress.  I read reviews about sizing and the size chart carefully.  I'm 5'6", 180.  The XXL was exactly perfect.  Beware--there is absolutely NO stretch in the fabric.  That said, it is super-cute and has the pin-up vibe I was going for.  Depending on how you wear it, it can go from rockabilly to Lucy Riccardo.Comments about the side zipper are all true.  Is there anyone who likes a side zipper?  Who invented this idea?  However, it is sturdy enough, although, like every side zipper ever, has a tendency to stick at the waist seam.Comments about the extremely creased condition out of the package are also true, but ironing did the trick.I would buy similar from this seller again.
